note.title: Location of the Credential Store database file
note.p: The path of the KeePass database file.
Alternatively it is possible to specify the value as query parameter in the URL with ?file=

note.title: Location of the Credential Store key file
note.p: The path of the KeePass key file that contains the key for access to the KeePass database file (if a key file is assigned to KeePass database file). If no KeePass key file is specified, then the file name is assumed from the basename of the KeePass database file and the extension .key.
Alternatively it is possible to specify the value as query parameter in the URL with ?keyfile=

note.title: Path for the entries in the KeePass file
note.p:
To specify a path for all entries. This allows shorter values for references to the Credential Store.
Example:
credential_store_entry_path=/sos/jobscheduler
value for a parameter such as password parameter: cs://myMail
In the KeePass file you find the entry in /sos/jobscheduler/myMail
Alternatively it is possible to specify the value as query parameter in the URL with ?entry_path=
